Package components.englishAuction

Class EnglishAuctioneer

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
components.englishAuction.EnglishAuctioneer
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
public class EnglishAuctioneer extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
Class that represent an English auctioneer component, this class is supposed to manage an auction of an English protocol bidding
Author:
Malik Bouaoud and Sandrine Ear
